catalog_info.title: Elementary Korean for Advanced Beginners
catalog_info.notes: Classes meet five days a week, additional discussion sections to be arranged.
catalog_info.description: Designed for students with some listening and speaking background, either from prior formal learning or previous exposure to a Korean speaking community. Introductory Korean course, with emphasis on reading and writing. After successful completion of this course, students are expected be able to understand main ideas and/or some facts from the simple connected texts dealing with basic personal and social needs, and to be able to meet a number of practical writing needs.
